summary: REQ-44 typing/backspace behavior is implemented in HomePage.tsx, but the diff also introduces broader component-level changes (new state/effect logic and imports) despite the constraint to apply changes ONLY to the selected span. Additionally, an extra pulsing cursor element was added inside the span, which was not explicitly requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update ONLY the selected Home page hero headline span element (XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/h1[1]/span[1]`, implemented in `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx`) to animate its text with a typing effect cycling Planning → Precision → Performance with backspace deletions, without changing the span’s existing Tailwind classes/font/color.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff modifies more than the selected span: it adds new React imports and adds new state/effect logic at the component level, which violates the explicit constraint to apply changes ONLY to the selected element.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a pulsing cursor character (`|`) as a nested `|` inside the target headline span.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks for typing/backspace cycling of the words; it does not request an additional blinking/pulsing cursor element.
The BuildRequest scope is limited to updating the selected span in `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx`; updating repo summary/state files was not requested.
